summary: This document is a chain of emails from late May 2023 discussing scheduling and a request for information related to a 'Leon Black review.' The emails reference a trial, interview notes, and a victim interview conducted as part of that review.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a review or due diligence process; the emails discuss obtaining notes and a list of victims from this review.

events.title: Email exchange regarding Leon Black review
events.description: A series of emails discussing scheduling and a request for interview notes and a victim list from a review concerning Leon Black.

events.title: Upcoming trial
events.description: One correspondent mentions second-seating a trial the following week, which may conclude on a Thursday.

keyFacts: The emails discuss a 'Leon Black review' that involved interviewing at least one victim.
A request is made for any written notes from this review and for a list of victims who were part of it.
The correspondence mentions a separate, recent trial experience described as 'terrific' but more work than anticipated.
The emails are professional in tone, focused on scheduling and information sharing about the review.
